00036 // Create /server -u <server> commands (first free context)
00037 #define KVI_IRCURL_CONTEXT_FIRSTFREE 0
00038 // Create /server -n <server> commands (new irc context)
00039 #define KVI_IRCURL_CONTEXT_NEW 1
00040 // Create /server <server> commands (this irc context)
00041 #define KVI_IRCURL_CONTEXT_THIS 2
